thread.title: BRIEF-Live Nation Entertainment Announces Pricing Of Private Notes Offerings

title: BRIEF-Live Nation Entertainment Announces Pricing Of Private Notes Offerings
text: March 16, 2018 / 1:08 AM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Live Nation Entertainment Announces Pricing Of Private Notes Offerings Reuters Staff March 15 (Reuters) - Live Nation Entertainment Inc: * LIVE NATION ENTERTAINMENT ANNOUNCES PRICING OF PRIVATE NOTES OFFERINGS * ‍PRICED OFFERINGS OF $500 MILLION IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF ITS 2.5% CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023​ * PRICED OFFERING OF $300 MILLION IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF ITS 5.625% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026​ * ‍CONVERTIBLE NOTES AND SENIOR NOTES WERE EACH PRICED AT 100.000% OF THEIR PRINCIPAL AMOUNT.​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
